meanings.definition: The act of merging or combining two or more entities into one.
meanings.sent1: The merger of two companies created a larger corporation.
meanings.sent2: After the merger, the two teams worked together seamlessly.
meanings.sent3: The merger of peanut butter and jelly resulted in a delicious sandwich.
meanings.sent4: The merger of colors in the sunset painted the sky with vibrant hues.
meanings.sent5: The merger of ingredients in the recipe produced a flavorful dish.

meanings.definition: The result of merging or combining two or more entities into one.
meanings.sent1: The merger of the two departments led to increased efficiency.
meanings.sent2: The merger of flavors in the dish created a unique taste.
meanings.sent3: The merger of socks in the laundry mysteriously disappeared.
meanings.sent4: The merger of melodies in the song harmonized beautifully.
meanings.sent5: The merger of puzzle pieces revealed the complete picture.
